text: @piersmorgan Haven't read all the comments but has anyone picked up on Cummings' uncle dying from CV last month ? Together they 'ran' the Klute (listed as Ltd on Companies House site) Nightclub in Durham, reviewed as the World's Worst by Vice, FHM et al https://t.co/K7dn0drMcZ
